hints.content:
$\blue2\pink2$ has $\blue2$ tens and $\pink2$ ones.

$\blue{4}\pink{9}$ has $\blue4$ tens and $\pink9$ ones.

$\blue8\pink2$ has $\blue8$ tens and $\pink2$ ones.  

$\blue9\pink5$ has $\blue9$ tens and $\pink5$ ones.

The least number is $22$ because it has $2$ tens and $2$ ones.

The greatest number is $95$ because it has $9$ tens and $5$ ones.
Here are the numbers in order from least to greatest: $22$, $49$, $82$, $95$.
